(watch only) (address book) Archived
Transaction complete Transaction failed OK, let\'s go! Simplified backup and recovery. Enhanced privacy through hierarchical deterministic addresses. Customize the way you organize your Bitcoin in your Blockchain Wallet.
Hey, we\'ve added these new features to your Blockchain wallet: Upgrading… Your wallet is upgrading, please be patient this may take some time depending on the size and age of your wallet. Your wallet has been upgraded! You are now running the most secure and private Blockchain Wallet. You may continue to your wallet now. CLOSE All Unexpected error, please try again later. Wallet upgrade failed! There was an error upgrading your wallet. Please try again later. Your Blockchain Wallet installation is incomplete. Please re-pair your wallet or create a new one.
You are about to receive bitcoin to a watch only address. You can only spend these funds if you have access to the private key. Continue?
The camera is currently opened by another application. Please close other application and try again.
Validating Password… Validating PIN… Creating PIN… Decrypting Wallet… Password unchanged Password changed Your password has been changed, please re-pair your wallet Your verified email address is used to send login codes when suspicious or unusual activity is detected, to remind you of your wallet login ID, and to send bitcoin payment alerts when you receive funds. Disable rooted device warning
Show Balance Create new address Authorization failed. Please try again. Send failed. Please try again.
Wallet update received
Your device appears to be rooted. Be advised that storing funds on a rooted device is unsafe and, in addition, can cause stability issues. If you continue to use our Bitcoin wallet on this device we recommend that you use double encryption on your Blockchain account. Your wallet already contains this address. A new address cannot be created at this time. Please try again. Saving address…
Blockchain Wallet cannot be run on this device. Label Edit Label can\'t be blank. Name already in use Warning
We are unable to connect to the host to establish a secure connection. Please verify your network connection and device before continuing. Retry Exit Screen overlay detected! Apps that use screen overlays have the ability to trick you into tapping on unseen objects and potentially steal funds. Note that this warning will also be triggered by screen dimming apps. If you are confident that there is no threat you may continue.
This item has been archived, and is unaccessible in the mobile app experience. Though you cannot send funds from this item, any funds will remain safe. Simply unarchive this item to start using it again. This item is not archived. Archive this item if you do NOT want to use it anymore. Your funds will remain safe, and you can unarchive it at anytime. Archive swept addresses?
1 address was successfully transferred to My Bitcoin Wallet. Would you like to archive this address now?
%d addresses were successfully transferred to My Bitcoin Wallet. Would you like to archive these addresses now?
This item is set as your default and can\'t be archived. Extended Public Key Address Copy xpub Scan this code or copy it into your Blockchain Merchant app to securely receive Bitcoin.
Sharing your xPub authorizes others to track your transaction history. As authorized persons may be able to disrupt you from accessing your wallet, only share your xPub with people you trust. Assign a friendly display name. Copy address Archive Unarchive Are you sure you want to archive this item? Are you sure you want to unarchive this item? Can\'t send to the same address. Make default Private Key Needed This action requires the private key for the Bitcoin address %1$s. Please scan the QR code. Invalid private key You are about to import a watch only address, an address (or public key script) stored in the wallet without the corresponding private key. This means that the funds can be spent ONLY if you have the private key stored elsewhere. If you do not have the private key stored, do NOT instruct anyone to send you bitcoin to the watch only address.\n\nThese options are recommended for advanced users only. Continue?
Scan private key Private key successfully imported. NOTE: The scanned private key does not correspond to your watch only address. To spend your funds from this address, please scan the correct private key. Watch Only If you are a merchant, show your xPub and use the Blockchain Merchant app to receive funds safely and privately.\n\nKeep your xPub private. Someone with access to your xPub will be able to see all your funds and transactions.
This is a watch only address. To spend your funds from this wallet, please scan your private key.
Success Default Try Again
Transfer Transfer Imported Addresses? Looks like you have some bitcoins in imported addresses. Imported addresses are not backed up by your Backup Phrase. To secure these funds, we recommend transferring these balances to include in your backup. spendable addresses Transfer Confirmed Confirm Transfer Transfer all Transfer Amount Archive imported addresses after transfer
1 imported address

Archive Confirmed
Don\'t ask me again. Transaction fee is too low. customize Amount Transaction fees impact how quickly the Bitcoin mining network will confirm your transactions, and depend on the current network conditions. We recommend the fee below for this transaction at this time. Not now You specified an unusually high transaction fee of %1$s.\n\nEven if you lower the fee to %2$s, you can expect the transaction to confirm within the next ~10 minutes (1 block).
You specified an exceptionally small transaction fee of %1$s.\n\nYour transaction may become stuck and possibly never confirm. To increase the likelihood for your transaction to confirm within approximately one hour (6 blocks) we strongly recommend a fee of no less than %2$s. Raise fee Lower fee Keep high fee Keep low fee
No confirmed funds to spend. Estimated confirmation time: ~%1$d minutes (%2$d blocks) Your fee is so small that your transaction may never be confirmed. The Bitcoin mining network is currently experiencing a high volume of activity, resulting in recommended fees that are higher than usual. Wallet version %1$s not supported. Please login to your wallet in the web browser to disable 2FA. Field can\'t be empty. Error updating settings, please try again
Camera access is required. Location access is required. Write external storage is required. not specified Failed to update. Verify Mobile Select Country We have sent your mobile phone an SMS message with a verification code. Enter the code to verify your mobile phone number. Code invalid, please try again Your mobile phone can be used to enable two-factor authentication, helping to secure your wallet from unauthorized access.
Fingerprint Unlock 2-step Verification Block Tor Requests Block IP addresses that are known to be part of the Tor anonymizing network. The Tor network is frequently used by hackers attempting to access Blockchain user\'s wallets. Enable Screenshots Some screens within the application can display sensitive data. Other applications will be able to access these screenshots.
Your Blockchain Wallet never communicates your password to our servers. This means we have no idea what your password is and we cannot reset it if you forget it. Create a memorable password hint that we can send to your verified email address in case you forget your password. Change Password Your password is never shared with our servers, which means we cannot help reset your password if you forget it. Make sure you backup your funds from the side menu which can restore access to your wallet in the event of a lost password. We have sent your email address a verification link. Click the link to verify your email address. Email Notifications Get notified when you receive bitcoin. Current Password New Password Mobile number verified Preferences Protect your wallet from unauthorized access by enabling 2-Step Verification. Protect your wallet from unauthorized access by enabling 2-Step Verification. You can choose to use your mobile phone number to secure your wallet. This code will be requested when you try to access your wallet via the web browser.\n\nIn order to use other authentication methods instead, please login to our web wallet at %1$s
Rate Blockchain Wallet Enjoying the Blockchain Wallet? Please take a moment to leave a review in Google Play and let others know about it. Yes, rate Blockchain Wallet No, thanks Remind me later Why has my address changed? Information Learn More Log in to Web Wallet Go to %1$s on your computer. Select Log in via mobile Using your computer\'s camera, scan the QR code below. Show QR code Hide QR code Keep this code hidden until you\'re ready. Keep this code safe!\nDo not share with others.
Bitcoin payment request Please send%1$s BTC to the Bitcoin address %2$s. attached Tap to copy this address. Share it with the sender via email or text.
Warning The PIN you have selected is extremely common and may be easily guessed by someone with access to your phone within 3 tries. Would you like to use this PIN anyway? Try again Continue
You have logged out or there was an error decrypting your wallet. Enter your password below to login. If you would like to forget this wallet and start over, press \'Forget Wallet\'. Forget wallet This will erase all wallet data on this device. Please confirm you have your wallet information saved elsewhere otherwise any bitcoin in this wallet will be inaccessible!!
Unable to connect to server. Please try again later.
This is an oversized bitcoin transaction. Your wallet needs to consolidate many smaller payments you\'ve received in the past. This requires a relatively high fee in order to be confirmed quickly.
Go back Accept higher fee "This transaction requires a higher fee for dust consumption due to the small amount of change to be returned." Be careful! Revealing this text allows your password to be copied to the clipboard, which can then be read by all applications on your device. Also be aware of people standing behind you!
SMS Notifications Enable notifications to receive an SMS whenever you receive bitcoin.
Transaction What\'s this for? Date Status Confirmed Pending (%1$s/%2$s Confirmations) "Transaction fee: %1$s" Value when received:\u0020 Value when transferred:\u0020 Value when sent:\u0020 Value:\u0020 Unknown No Inputs (Newly Generated Coins) May be at risk for a double spend. Verify on Blockchain.info Share transaction details Note
Check your email Check email We sent an email to %1$s. Look for an email from Blockchain and click the verification link to complete your wallet setup. Email Address Add and verify your email address to receive alerts, prevent suspicious activity, and recover your Wallet ID if forgotten. Add Backup your funds For your security, we do not keep any passwords on file. Backup your wallet to ensure your bitcoins are safe in case you lose your password. Backup Prevent unauthorized access to your wallet. Enable 2-Step Verification to increase wallet security.
Backup Phrase For your security, Blockchain does not keep any passwords on file. The following 12 word Backup Phrase will give you access to your funds in case you lose your password. Be sure to write it on a piece of paper and to keep it somewhere safe and secure. Start backup It is important to make sure you write down your words exactly as they appear here and in this order. Backup Complete You can use your Backup Phrase to restore your funds if you lose your password. Anyone with access to your Backup Phrase can access your bitcoin so remember to keep it offline somewhere safe and secure. Backup again Backup confirmed Last backup: %1$s Enter the following words from your Backup Phrase to complete the backup process. NEXT WORD PREVIOUS WORD Word of Word Mismatch DONE Lost your 12 word backup phrase?
Use your fingerprint for faster, easier access to your wallet.\n\nConfirm fingerprint to continue Confirm fingerprint to continue Touch sensor Fingerprint login Fingerprint not recognized. Either the fingerprints stored on this device have changed or the keyguard has been disabled Keys invalidated, PIN code required There have been too many failed attempts in the last 30 minutes. Please attempt setup again later. There have been too many failed attempts. Please log in using your PIN instead. Unexpected error

Cannot be empty Via QR code (in-person) Using a link Scan a QR code Someone sent me a link Accept Invite If someone sent you a link, simply tap on the link to accept. I want to: Transactions with %1$s: No transactions yet Rename contact Delete contact Ask to send %1$s bitcoin Request bitcoin from %1$s Invalid QR code Contact request sent Just added Trusted Once removed, you will have to invite this contact again. Amount Waiting for %1$s to accept Request has been sent Your contact has been notified that you would like to send them Bitcoin. When they accept, we will notify you and you can complete the transaction. Send request Transaction not found Address sent successfully Sending address failed This will send an address to your contact. Proceed? Your contact has been informed that you wish to send them bitcoin and that you require an address from them. We will notify you when they have sent an address! Your contact has been informed that you wish to receive bitcoin from them and has been sent an address. We will notify you when they have sent you bitcoin! Checking messages failed, please try again We\'re just informing your contact that you\'ve sent them some bitcoin, please wait. Payment sent! We\'ve notified your contact to let them know that you\'ve completed the transaction. There was an error notifying your contact that you have sent them a payment. Please check your connection and try again. We couldn\'t connect you to the contacts service. Please retry to enable full functionality. Looks like you sent more bitcoin than was requested. You can request some back from your contact if you wish. We have not marked the payment as complete. Looks like you sent less bitcoin than was requested. Your contact will still receive the bitcoin you sent, but we have not marked the payment as complete. To use this service, we require you to enter your second password. You should only need to enter this once to use the Contacts functionality. In Progress Finished Request payment No confirmed contacts found! Are you sure you want to decline this pending transaction? Once you decline a payment, no further action can be taken. Are you sure you want to cancel this pending transaction? Once you cancel a payment, no further action can be taken. Transaction Started We have notified %1$s about your request to start a transaction. Request Sent Your payment request of %1$s has been sent to %2$s.

Introducing contacts You can now transact without the hassle of Bitcoin addresses. Add your first contact via the sidebar. It\'s simple and secure Select Contact Please select contact first.
Swipe to receive Reveal a receive address when you swipe left on the PIN screen, making receiving bitcoin even faster. Five addresses will be loaded consecutively, after which logging in is required to show new addresses. No more addresses can be loaded right now. Log in to the app to load more.
Fingerprint Login Use fingerprint login instead of your PIN to authenticate and access your wallet. Enable fingerprint I\'ll do this later Check Your Inbox Look for an email from Blockchain and click the verification link to complete your wallet setup. Verify email Receive Bitcoin Current Price: QR Codes Scan Address We work with exchange partners all over the world, so you can buy bitcoin directly from your wallet. Send your wallet address to a friend to request bitcoin. An address is a string of random letters and numbers that change for each transaction. An address can also be shown as a QR code. Scan a friend’s QR code to quickly capture their wallet address.
Buy Bitcoin Get Bitcoin That\'s it for now! We’ll keep you up-to-date here with recommendations and new features. Start Over Skip All Trade Complete Your Buy Bitcoin trade has been completed! View details Available now Buy bitcoin directly from your mobile wallet. It\'s simple, seamless, and secure. The buy experience may be a little slow on your device. Thanks in advance for your patience. To use this service, we require you to enter your second password. You should only need to enter this once to use the Buy functionality.
Enter 2FA code Please enter a valid 2FA code from your authenticator app to continue. We have just sent you an SMS containing a 2FA code. Please enter it here to continue. 2FA code 2FA code cannot be empty 2FA code incorrect
Change fee Error getting fee options
Regular Priority Custom 1+ hour ~0–60 min Advanced users only %1$s sat/b Low fee not recommended Unnecessarily high fee This feature is recommended for advanced users only. By choosing a custom fee, you risk overpaying or your transaction never being confirmed. sat/b Regular: %1$s, Priority: %2$s
